name: PT Kampung Marketerindo Berdaya
description: Operator of an end-to-end e-commerce platform designed for effective and integrated online business development. The company platform provides e-commerce talents and helps improve sales performance by providing trained talent support, order delivery platforms, and warehouse management, enabling small and medium enterprises to recruit for their internet commerce operations.
one_liner: Operator of an end-to-end e-commerce platform designed for effective and integrated online business development. The company platform provides e-commerce talents and helps improve sales performance by providing trained talent support, order delivery platforms, and warehouse management, enabling small and medium enterprises to recruit for their internet commerce operations.
